pages.text: Once upon a time, there was a little fox who lived in a beautiful forest. The little fox had bright orange fur and a big bushy tail.
One sunny day, the little fox decided to go for a walk. As he walked through the forest, he saw colorful butterflies flying between the flowers.
The little fox came to a stream with clear blue water. In the water, he could see fish swimming happily. The fox smiled and continued his adventure through the forest.
